data.title: The Book of Cacti and Other Succulents
data.meta_description: The Book of Cacti and Other Succulents - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document introduces succulent plants. It describes how succulents evolved as the Earth's climate changed over millions of years, forming deserts where forests once stood. Succulents developed thick leaves, stems, or branches to store water efficiently, allowing them to survive in dry conditions. The document provides background on succulents before delving into their classification and features in later chapters.
data.text: The Book of Cacti and Other Succulents
